name: Dormination
description:
In this 4-player competitive couch sim, your objective is to try to stay sane living among the various students with whom you've found yourself sharing accommodation in campus housing for the year.

While attending Global Game Jam 2019, we devised a concept for a new game based on the theme Home. That game became Dormination. After completing GGJ 2019 and deciding that Dormination deserved more TLC than was possible over a single weekend, we decided to polish it up for a full fledged release.

Early Access Notice - We are releasing Dormination currently as an early access title. It is not feature complete, things are liable to change. At present time the game requires 4 players in local multiplayer.  We have plans to enable 2-4 player multiplayer, both local and online, but for now you'll just have to talk your friends into joining you.
